name: My Fragile Soul
description:
A simple, yet insanely hard, arcade game. Unlike most games and tales, the hero of this game has a fragile soul. He is easily hurt and is very emotionally sensitive at the moment. The soul of our hero resides in the middle of the screen and his problems fly at him spontaneously. Protect our hero, and help him ease his mind. If you don't protect, he might... Well... Die... Click, scream, and maybe even cry, in this somewhat sad virtual arcade game.

Our hero has a fragile soul. Help him keep it...

=====================================

If you have any feedback, head over to my website http://www.azeganindustries.weebly.com and submit a contact form. I would love to hear what you have to say! I made this game in two days to benchmark my skills as a developer. If you would like to see more games from me, please follow me and stay updated with my youtube channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5GLuiuSE1W5Zu6SaNXLekw
